patthana15.23:4.1: Sahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.23:5.1: Sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.23:5.2: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.23:6.1: Ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.23:6.2: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
